messages.subject: YES!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/14/03 7:24:19 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/14/03 7:24:19 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< But you do have a magic wand! We all do. It's just that we can only use it
to work on ourselves, not others.

My own private magic wand allows me to see, but not be affected by, the rude
drivers, petty people and mean neighbors. I use it to allow my true self ,
that which is beyond this human form, to shine. My true self can't be
bothered with petty grudges. They just flow on by. >>

Oh I know this!! :)
I just want to wave a wand though, it's much easier.

The neighbors that have it in for us have started putting up lattice work
wherever our properties allow a view (which is everywhere on a tiny city
lot), so I guess I won't be able to see them much longer. YAY!
Put your intentions out to the universe and SEE what happens? :)hehe

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
